reasoning: Reporting incidence at birth. CDH occurs in approximately 2.3 per 10,000 live births (23 per 100k) based on congenital anomaly registries. Well-documented birth defect with consistent global data.
source: McGivern MR et al. (2015). Epidemiology of congenital diaphragmatic hernia in Europe: a register-based study. Arch Dis Child Fetal Neonatal Ed. 100(2):F137-44
